org.j2free.admin
Class ReflectionMarshaller

java.lang.Object
  org.j2free.admin.ReflectionMarshaller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Marshaller
public final class ReflectionMarshaller
extends java.lang.Object
implements Marshaller

Marshalls Objects of unknown Types in order to access their fields and methods;
